abstract: Guy Roland N'Dy Assembé (born February 28, 1986 in Yaoundé) is a Cameroonian football goalkeeper who is under contract for French side Nancy but currently on loan at Guingamp.
comment: Guy Roland N'Dy Assembé (born February 28, 1986 in Yaoundé) is a Cameroonian football goalkeeper who is under contract for French side Nancy but currently on loan at Guingamp.
